Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.actors

Class ActorFsm<O extends ActorFsm<O,S,E>,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.fsm.actors.ActorImp<Event<E>>
net.tangly.fsm.actors.ActorFsm<O,S,E>
Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Actor<Event<E>>
public class ActorFsm<O extends ActorFsm<O,S,E>,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>> extends ActorImp<Event<E>>
A local actor implements the actor contract as a local thread running in the virtual machine. An actor completes when its finite state machine reaches a final state and the associated thread is returned to the pool of available threads.
